item.description:
This is not an April Fool's Joke !

Good Movies Season (OK, Summer Blockbuster Season) has started and I'll be featuring on average one movie a week to see over the next few months. First up this week: GI Joe Retaliation, the follow up to GI Joe Rise of Cobra, a guy flick if there ever was one.

It features Bruce Willis, Magic Mik... huh... Channing Tatum, The Rock, Adrianne Palicki and Ray Park as Silent Ninja Extraordinaire Snake Eyes!

Here's what critics say about it:
http://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/gi_joe_retaliation/

Should people object to the choice, we can always change it. List your choices in the comments section. Spring Breakers is also highly rated this week, but might offend some people.

The venue this week will be the AMC in Framingham. Everybody is responsible for their ticket purchases. I'll arrive 30 minutes before the screening to meet people beforehand.
item.name: Good Movies Season: GI Joe Retaliation
